content.rendered:
Irez Academy-We are Hiring…!

We are looking for a Medical Coding Tutor for our Kochi Branch.

Qualifications:

•Medical Coder ( CPC Holder) preferred
•Must have 2 years experience in teaching or work experience
•Excellent communication skills

If anyone is interested kindly send your updated resume to jobopenings@irez.in
